mapper.select: SELECT C.*, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, M.BRAND_NAME, P.PRODUCT_TYPE, LOWER(ATT_NAME) ATT_NAME FROM CART C, PRODUCT P, MEMBER M, ATTACHMENT A WHERE C.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO AND P.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND P.PRODUCT_NO = A.PRODUCT_NO AND ATT_LEVEL = 1 AND C.CART_NO < 10000 AND C.MEMBER_NO = ${member_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET CART_QUANTITY = ${quantity} WHERE CART_NO = ${cart_no}
